seller_description: This donut-style pet bed features an ultra-soft faux fur exterior and a plush bolster rim, providing cozy warmth and comfort for your pet. The bed is machine washable with a removable cover for easy care. Its dimensions are 23 x 23 inches, offering ample space for your pet to relax.
review: Transform your pet’s nap time into a luxury experience with this donut-style bed! It’s more than just a sleeping spot—it’s an oasis of comfort and warmth. Your pet will adore curling up in its soft embrace, feeling safe, secure, and endlessly pampered.
